desc: Say hello to your body's new BFF. A multi-tasking blend of essential nutrients to support daily health and help fill the gaps when your eating habits are a little less than perfect. An amazing blend of organic apple cider vinegar with "the mother", beet root, cranberry, vitamin B9, and vitamin B12 in a red vegan gummy.

layout.text: Say hello to your body's new BFF! Your daily wellness gummy has a blend of organic ACV (with "the mother") and other superfoods that support detoxification*, metabolism*, & digestive health*.
